channel.title: Moving Npc's
channel.description: Alright well I removed all the npc's So i could place in the ones I want. Ik how to do it but it seems like maby objects interfere with the coords? If i put in an npc and there's an object with in his x\y\x\y bounds it gives the java error Npc Fucked. Surely objects shouldn't affect it? Any help is appd. +

item.title: Moving Npc's
item.dc:creator: @Rick_kloos Rick kloos
item.description:
@Rick_kloos wrote:

Yeah I noticed that too, but it worked with objects you just had to have min coords set correctly

Read full topic

item.title: Moving Npc's
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

remenissions:

Yeah, Sorry it worked Hey addu, do you have a msn though? If you have some time I wrote up a script but its getting an error. I think its just with the closings but not sure. If you wouldn’t mind taking a look that is.

You can post it right here or PM the script. If you want my msn, its in my profile.

Read full topic

item.title: Moving Npc's
item.dc:creator: @remenissions remenissions
item.description:
@remenissions wrote:

Alright, well i’ll check and make sure they are lower. I didn’t do that. Reason I wans’t sure about that though is because i know previous servers have had npc’s with objects in their coords, for example Kryptix and his chaos imps through the wild.

Read full topic

item.title: Moving Npc's
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Make sure the first x and first y are LOWER then the second x and second y.

Yea Objects/Walls Interfere. (If I remember correctly) Bout 70% sure.

Read full topic
